A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This movie has moments so cringe-worthy that it makes Jar Jar look like Daniel Day Lewis in the prequels. 

I honestly couldn't believe what I was watching\, besides two or three well-crafted sequences near the middle/end\, this movie was a scrambled mess. 

Rian wouldn't let a single moment of drama sink in without immediately ruining it with a cheap joke. There was no room suspense and no depth or character development\, just lazy writing and terrible structure.

Unfortunately it's not just a bad Star Wars movie; it's a legitimately poorly made film.

It came off more as a parody of star wars than an actual star wars...I'm still letting it all sink in.

I feel bad posting negative comments online as I know what "troll" culture has become...but\, I mean\, this is just bad.
